items.name: Mac Royale breakfast on coals
items.description: 325g Mac Royale burger grilled on coals,The meal is served with a bun with lettuce tomato, purple onion and pickles, Mac Royale sauce, Cola Zero regular 400ml Plain chips 100g

items.name: Spicy Mac Royal meal
items.description: 325g Mac Royal burger grilled on coals, served on a bun with lettuce, tomato, purple onion and pickles and a spicy royal sauce

items.name: Siam salad meal with crunchies
items.description: Asian salad in Siam sauce with a mixture of peanuts, sesame seeds, crispy onion chips and chunks of crunchy chicken
